description: This dataset contains neighborhood variables gathered from the American Community Survey (ACS) from 2018 to 2022. It includes data related to commuting patterns, such as car usage and average travel time to work, providing insights into neighborhood-level transportation behaviors at the Census tract level.
source: American Community Survey 5-year data - U.S. Census Bureau

variables.name: car_commute
variables.description: Number of workers who commute to work by car, truck, or van

variables.name: mean_travel_time
variables.description: Mean travel time to work for workers 16 years and over (in minutes)

notes: GEOIDs correspond to Census tracts for the given year of the dataset. Note that Census tract boundaries have changed after the 2020 decennial census, which may affect geographic consistency over time.
